column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. After heavy contact, the Red Army Base is cleared and secured. Over.
Bravo dustoff, this is Alpha team. We need your extract. We can't stay here, that's for sure. Over.
Bravo to Alpha team, your LZ is in view. Might be a warm one. Get ready to rope in. Out.
This is Bravo. Copy that Alpha, blackhawk taxi service here, on our way. Bravo out.
Bravo to Alpha team, get ready for extraction. We're just going to touch and go, so get on quick. Out.
That's it, we're getting the flock out of here. Heading home. Bravo out.
Papa Bear to Alpha Black. Roger that. Really? Okay yes, we believe you. Man. Make sure the extract LZ is safe prior to calling Bravo. Out.
Papa Bear to Alpha squad. Welcome back, you ruthless bastards. Mission accomplished. Out.
Gross, Ranger, at US Army Base.
